member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Logging.InternalLogger
member.summary: An internal implementation of that is used when no other loggers are specified

member.name: P:MtconnectCore.Logging.MtconnectCoreLogger.InternalLogLevel
member.summary: Sets the minimum logging level when no is provided.

member.name: P:MtconnectCore.Logging.MtconnectCoreLogger.Logger
member.summary: Reference to the logger used within the MtconnectCore library.

member.param: Reference to the implemented logger. See

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.MtconnectIntervalStreamCallback
member.summary: An asynchronous callback method to call when an interval request receives a complete MTConnect Response Document.
member.param: A MTConnect Response Document in its generic form. This is because the document responding document could be a .

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.MtconnectAgentService
member.summary: A HTTP service that standardizes the requests that can be made to a MTConnect Agent according to the MTConnect specification.

member.name: M:MtconnectCore.MtconnectAgentService.TryParse(System.Xml.XmlDocument,MtconnectCore.Standard.Documents.IResponseDocument@)
member.summary: Tries to parse a into the appropriate based on the MTConnect standard.
member.param: Output of the appropriately formated type. Note that this document could result in a .
member.returns: Flag for whether or not the could be identified as an implemented .

member.name: M:MtconnectCore.MtconnectAgentService.Probe(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a Probe Request to the MTConnect Agent. See Part 1 Section 8.3.1 of MTConnect specification.
member.param: If present, specifies that only the Equipment Metadata for the piece of equipment represented by the name or uuid will be published. See Part 1 Section 8.3.1.1 of MTConnect specification.

member.name: M:MtconnectCore.MtconnectAgentService.Current(System.String,MtconnectCore.Standard.CurrentRequestQuery)
member.summary: Sends a Current Request to the MTConnect Agent. See Part 1 Section 8.3.2 of MTConnect specification.
member.param: If present, specifies that only the Equipment Metadata for the piece of equipment represented by the name or uuid will be published. See Part 1 Section 8.3.2.1 of MTConnect specification.
If present, specifies various query parameters to precisely define the specific information to be included in the response document. See Part 1 Section 8.3.2.2 of MTConnect specification.

member.name: M:MtconnectCore.MtconnectAgentService.CurrentInterval(MtconnectCore.MtconnectIntervalStreamCallback,System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.String,MtconnectCore.Standard.CurrentRequestQuery)
member.summary: Sends a Current Request in the form of a HTTP Data Streaming request or Publish/Subscribe. See Part 1 Section 8.3.6 of MTConnect specification.
member.param: An asynchronous callback method to call when an interval request receives a complete MTConnect document.
A token for cancelling the loop that keeps the HTTP Data Stream open.
If present, specifies that only the Equipment Metadata for the piece of equipment represented by the name or uuid will be published. See Part 1 Section 8.3.2.1 of MTConnect specification.
If present, specifies various query parameters to precisely define the specific information to be included in the response document. See Part 1 Section 8.3.2.2 of MTConnect specification.

member.name: M:MtconnectCore.MtconnectAgentService.Sample(System.String,MtconnectCore.Standard.SampleRequestQuery)
member.summary: Sends a Sample Request to the MTConnect Agent. See Part 1 Section 8.3.3 of MTConnect specification.
member.param: If present, specifies that only the Equipment Metadata for the piece of equipment represented by the name or uuid will be published. See Part 1 Section 8.3.3.1 of MTConnect specification.
If present, specifies various query parameters to precisely define the specific information to be included in the response document. See Part 1 Section 8.3.3.2 of MTConnect specification.

member.name: M:MtconnectCore.MtconnectAgentService.SampleInterval(MtconnectCore.MtconnectIntervalStreamCallback,System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.String,MtconnectCore.Standard.SampleRequestQuery)
member.summary: Sends a Sample Request in the form of a HTTP Data Streaming request or Publish/Subscribe. See Part 1 Section 8.3.6 of MTConnect specification.
member.param: An asynchronous callback method to call when an interval request receives a complete MTConnect document.
A token for cancelling the loop that keeps the HTTP Data Stream open.
If present, specifies that only the Equipment Metadata for the piece of equipment represented by the name or uuid will be published. See Part 1 Section 8.3.3.1 of MTConnect specification.
If present, specifies various query parameters to precisely define the specific information to be included in the response document. See Part 1 Section 8.3.3.2 of MTConnect specification.

member.name: P:MtconnectCore.Standard.AssetRequestQuery.Type
member.summary: Defines the type of MTConnect Asset to be returned in the MTConnectAssets Response Document. See Part 1 Section 8.3.4.2 of MTConnect specification.

member.name: P:MtconnectCore.Standard.AssetRequestQuery.Removed
member.summary: If the value of the removed parameter in the query is true, then Asset Documents for Assets that have been marked as removed from a piece of equipment will be included in the Response Document. If the value of the removed parameter in the query is false, then Asset Documents for Assets that have been marked as removed from a piece of equipment will not be included in the Response Document. See Part 1 Section 8.3.4.2 of MTConnect specification.

member.name: P:MtconnectCore.Standard.AssetRequestQuery.Count
member.summary: Defines the maximum number of Asset Documents to return in an MTConnectAssets Response Document. See Part 1 Section 8.3.4.2 of MTConnect specification.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.Error.ErrorCodes
member.summary: Reference Part 1, Section 9.1.2.3 of the MTConnect Standard for a list of appropriate values for the errorCode attribute

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Contracts.Enums.MtconnectNodeNameProcessors
member.summary: An enumeration of available methods of parsing MTConnect node names from a MTConnect document

member.name: P:MtconnectCore.Standard.CurrentRequestQuery.Path
member.summary: An XPath that defines specific information or a set of information to be included in an MTConnectStreams Response Document. See Part 1 Section 8.3.2.2 of MTConnect specification.

member.name: P:MtconnectCore.Standard.CurrentRequestQuery.At
member.summary: Requests that the MTConnect Response Documents MUST include the current value for all Data Entities relative to the time that a specific sequence number was recorded. See Part 1 Section 8.3.2.2 of MTConnect specification.

member.name: P:MtconnectCore.Standard.CurrentRequestQuery.Interval
member.summary: The Agent MUST continuously publish Response Documents when the query parameters include interval using the value as the period between adjacent publications. See Part 1 Section 8.3.2.2 of MTConnect specification.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Documents.Error.Error
member.summary: Represents the Error element of the MTConnect Standard. See Part 1, Section 9.1.2 of the MTConnect Standard

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Documents.IResponseDocument
member.summary: Structural interface for a MTConnect Response Document. See Part 1 Section 6 of MTConnect specification.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Documents.IResponseDocumentHeader
member.summary: Structural interface for a MTConnect Response Document Header. See Part 1 Section 6.5 of MTConnect specification.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Documents.ResponseDocument`2
member.summary: Structural interface for a MTConnect Response Document. See Part 1 Section 6 of MTConnect specification.

member.name: T:MtconnectCore.Standard.Documents.ResponseDocumentHeader
member.summary: Structural interface for a MTConnect Response Document Header. See Part 1 Section 6.5 of MTConnect specification.

member.name: P:MtconnectCore.Standard.SampleRequestQuery.Path
member.summary: An XPath that defines specific information or a set of information to be included in an MTConnectStreams Response Document. See Part 1 Section 8.3.3.2 of MTConnect specification.

member.name: P:MtconnectCore.Standard.SampleRequestQuery.From
member.summary: The from parameter designates the sequence number of the first observation in the buffer the Agent MUST consider publishing in the Response Document. See Part 1 Section 8.3.3.2 of MTConnect specification.

member.name: P:MtconnectCore.Standard.SampleRequestQuery.Interval
member.summary: The Agent MUST continuously publish Response Documents when the query parameters include interval using the value as the minimum period between adjacent publications. See Part 1 Section 8.3.3.2 of MTConnect specification.

member.name: P:MtconnectCore.Standard.SampleRequestQuery.Count
member.summary: The count parameter designates the maximum number of observations the Agent MUST publish in the Response Document. See Part 1 Section 8.3.3.2 of MTConnect specification.

member.name: P:MtconnectCore.Standard.SampleRequestQuery.Heartbeat
member.summary: Sets the time period for the heartbeat function in an Agent. The value for heartbeat represents the amount of time after a Response Document has been published until a new Response Document MUST be published, even when no new data is available. See Part 1 Section 8.3.3.2 of MTConnect specification.
